goals.complete: Zojja, Mr. Sparkles, and I confronted Varkk just as he was about to claim his seat on the Arcane Council. We defeated his Inquest bodyguards and then administered justice to Varkk himself, Synergetics-style. With the betrayal of Pol and our entire crew avenged, we decided to take down Teyo and reclaim my krewe's Snaff Prize-winning invention.
